nodes.caption: Au. degree i = max (degree α, degree β, degree γ) Au. closeness i = max (cls α, cls β, cls γ) Au. betweenness i = max (bwn α, bwn β, bwn γ)
Citation count i = citations received in t+1 and t+2, where t=year of publication of i
Art. degree proportion i = degree i / #reference i Art. betweenness i Art. clustering coefficient i
